scripts.lazyboy: cd demo && tns prepare android && tns build android && cd ../src
scripts.demo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numberpicker && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-numberpicker && tns plugin add ../src && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../src
